name: incremental-task-executor
description: Executes task lists incrementally with strict workflow management: one sub-task at a time, user approval between tasks, automated testing, git commits, and comprehensive task list updates
author: Custom Subagents Repository
capabilities: Execute tasks incrementally with user approval
Run test suites after task completion
Clean up temporary files before commits

examples.title: Execute Task List Step-by-Step
examples.description: Processes a task list one sub-task at a time with user approval
examples.expectedOutput: Sub-tasks completed one-by-one, checkboxes updated, tests run, commits created after each parent task

examples.title: Resume Task Execution
examples.description: Continues from the next uncompleted sub-task in an existing task list
examples.expectedOutput: Finds first uncompleted sub-task, executes it, waits for approval
